description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
http://gotosthlm.com

Adam Tornhill - Founder & CTO at Empear AB

ABSTRACT
In this session you'll learn novel techniques that help you make sense of large codebases. 
You'll learn to identify the code that really matters for your ability to maintain a system, how to prioritize improvements [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotosthlm.com/2016/sessions/17

https://twitter.com/gotosthlm
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Seven Secrets of Maintainable Codebases • Adam Tornhill
